Product Description: Rescue hair from damage, dullness, and hairfall. Helps repair damaged hair to create smoothness, and reduces breakage for up to 10X stronger hair (strength against damage vs. non-conditioning shampoo). Gentle enough for everyday use, even for color or chemically treated hair. Formulated with Head and Shoulders’ Fresh Scent Technology featuring enhanced fragrance notes for an improved in-shower scent experience up to 100% dandruff free. Visible flakes with regular use.
